job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Data Scientist / AI Engineer, your focus will be on the technical aspects of AI and data science. You will build, deploy, and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines to solve complex business problems. You get out of bed to take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them., * Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
     * Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content.
     * Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases.
     * Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers.
     * Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact.
     * Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions

   Data at DEPT®:
     * A team of passionate data professionals who love working with cutting-edge technologies.
     * Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment.
     * A culture that promotes creative freedom, trust, and autonomy.
     * Support for personal and professional growth through coaching, development plans, and budget allocation.
     * Diverse projects that cater to your ambitions, from short-term challenges to long-term engagements.
     * High-profile clients like Philips, Just Eat Takeaway, and bol.com, making you a proud ambassador of DEPT®.
     * The best of both worlds: the benefits of an international leading agency with the energy and spirit of a local studio.

   We are committed to fostering diversity and creating an inclusive environment for everyone at DEPT®. We seek unique individuals who want to enhance our work and community.
job_details.full_text:
Data Scientist / AI Engineer

As a Data Scientist / AI Engineer, your focus will be on the technical aspects of AI and data science. You will build, deploy, and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines to solve complex business problems. You get out of bed to take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them., * Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
     * Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content.
     * Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases.
     * Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers.
     * Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact.
     * Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions

   Data at DEPT®:
     * A team of passionate data professionals who love working with cutting-edge technologies.
     * Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment.
     * A culture that promotes creative freedom, trust, and autonomy.
     * Support for personal and professional growth through coaching, development plans, and budget allocation.
     * Diverse projects that cater to your ambitions, from short-term challenges to long-term engagements.
     * High-profile clients like Philips, Just Eat Takeaway, and bol.com, making you a proud ambassador of DEPT®.
     * The best of both worlds: the benefits of an international leading agency with the energy and spirit of a local studio.

   We are committed to fostering diversity and creating an inclusive environment for everyone at DEPT®. We seek unique individuals who want to enhance our work and community.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building and deploying generative AI applications, including fine-tuning LLMs and working with frameworks like LangChain. While it includes ML model building, the explicit mention of generative AI and LLMs, coupled with software development and MLOps for user-facing systems, points strongly towards a GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them
ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical AI solutions that deliver tangible business value.
While not a primary focus, the mention of working closely with data engineers implies an understanding of and interaction with data pipelines and infrastructure.

phrases: build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content
Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases
job_tasks.justification: This directly covers the core activities of building traditional ML models and specifically highlights fine-tuning LLMs, which is a key aspect of generative AI modeling.

phrases: Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
deploy machine learning models, generative AI applications
job_tasks.justification: These phrases point to the development and architectural aspects of creating and deploying AI solutions, including user-facing applications and integrating them with frameworks and cloud services.

phrases: deploy and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines
Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers
job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of deploying and maintaining MLOps pipelines is a direct indicator of this task category.

soft_skills.skill: take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them
Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions
passionate data professionals who love working with cutting-edge technologies
Support for personal and professional growth
Diverse projects that cater to your ambitions
